/**
 * OTBN Special Purpose Registers: 32b CSRs, and WLEN WSRs
 */
module otbn_status_registers
  import otbn_pkg::*;
(
  input logic             clk_i,
  input logic             rst_ni,

  input [WLEN-1:0]        rnd_i
);

endmodule
